update user_management
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxid = #{wxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_management set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxid = #{wxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
